website_summaries.verdict: The Brooks Launch 6 according to most users have lived up to the usual high quality and performance of its predecessors.  The shoe is good neutral running shoe when it comes to fit, comfort, responsiveness, weight, and flexibility.  Despite a few buyers having mentioned that the shoe is a bit heavier and slightly narrower than its predecessor, the negative comments does not overshadow the overall positive response that most runners have. In conclusion, Brooks Launch 6 is a shoe that is suitable for neutral runners looking for speed, cushion, and durability.
pros: Majority of the runners like the fact that the Brooks Launch 6 is now more breathable thanks to its updated one-piece engineered mesh upper
Noted by some users is how significantly lightweight the Brooks Launch 6 is
Often mentioned by most users is the new one-piece upper that gives Brooks Launch 6 a nice snug fit
In some user reviews, they like that there are four color options for both Brooks Launch 6 men and Brooks Launch 6 women
Most runners find that the BioMoGo DNA midsole cushioning gel did not disappoint in being responsive when they run at a quicker pace, providing a great midfoot transition
According to several buyers, Brooks Launch 6 has a true to size fit and is also true to width, making it very comfortable to users
Also mentioned by a couple of runners is that they like the new layout of the Midfoot Transition Zone
The users have noticed the quick transition from heel to toe with this new design in the midfoot area
A few runners like the fact that Brooks brought back the strobel in the Brooks Launch 6 which had been left out in the Brooks Launch 5 in favor of a simple mesh
cons: Few purchasers have mentioned that even if Brooks claims that the Brooks Launch 6 is lighter than its forerunner, the Brooks Launch 5, the production models found in stores are a tad bit heavier than the Launch 5
Noted by a couple of runners is that even if the new one-piece upper provides a little more volume, it also makes the overall platform of the shoe a bit narrower

customer_reviews.title: Go with brooks ghost 12 instead
customer_reviews.text: Not good for moderate to long distance running. Recommend brooks ghost 12 over these. Its worth sacrificing the lighter weight for extra support and cushion. I am a neutral runner training for half marathon distances.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Just Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have owed numerous pairs of Brooks shoes and they are by far the best. However these shoe is not comfortable and it feels like there in no cushion in the front or toe of the shoe. Again I have been exercising in other Brooks shoes, Ravenna, Ghost ... These are no comparison. Spend a little more and get the right shoe
customer_reviews.author: Brad Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: great shoe, made me faster
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the first Brooks product I have tried (have always used ASICS in the past). Have only put about 10 miles on them so far and find the fit and comfort very good. This is the lightest shoe I have ever run in and I think this does make a performance difference. I had been trying all summer to get my one and two mile times down with little improvement. With this shoe I suddenly cut 12 and 25 seconds off. Maybe it was just the cooler weather but I think it was the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Brooks for a few years because of back and knee issues, usually Glycerins. I wanted to try these because they're less expensive. Also because the current Glycerin options were, frankly, kinda ugly and these (in blue and yellow) are not. To each their own though - that's subjective. The Launch shoe is noticeably more firm than the Glycerin line, which was fine at first... but as I wear them, I can definitely notice the difference, especially in my lower back. There isn't as much cushion, which is painful and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: James Spell

customer_reviews.title: Great for over pronation!
customer_reviews.text: I love how they look and they are great for my over pronation. The only thing is that with every pair of brooks I buy the tread that comes up on the toe always comes loose pretty quickly. But I love these shoes. They’re the only ones I wear.
customer_reviews.author: happy_homemaker2002

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying another Brooks sneaker, Launch, which I thought was as good as it gets. This time, I tried Revel, and the best became better! I can walk for miles, and at the age of 69, that's pretty good. No knee pain, no back pain, just happy walking with incredible posture.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: NICE SHOE BUT REPACKAGED AND APPEARS TO POSSIBLE HAVE BEEN SOMEONES RETURNED ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes but I was disappointed in the packaging. The shoes arrived in a generic box. Printed on the inside lid of the box was ... " This item has been repackaged ... because the original box was damaged in transit". The shoes appear to have been someone's returned item based on the lacing pattern of the two shoes which did not appear to be the traditional manufacturers lacing pattern. I rate the shoes a 5 but the packaging a very weak 2.
customer_reviews.author: Allen J

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for hours
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher & coach, my days can be long with hours on my feet. Being now older and a large guy with bad knees and back, I have to have great shoes to make it without suffering too much. These were so good in looks, comfort and price that I quickly bought a 2nd pair. The only shoe that has been slightly better were my Adidas ultraboost but they cost about double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M.

customer_reviews.title: I like this shoe, but am using 1/2 size smaller than for Lauch 5
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and work for me. Been using Launch for a few editions now. Run about 5 marathons a year (also an Ultra Marathon, 50K). These wear out fast (softer sole) than the Ravenna's I used to run in. I've had 3 BQ's in these shoes and won some half marathon's for my age group.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the casual runner/weekend warrior
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe! I had initially ordered a size 10.5 because the Merrell shoes I wear are that size and they were a bit short. I bumped up a half size and it made a world of difference. This shoe has great balance between feeling the surface you are running on and cushion to prevent too much jarring of my joints. The drop from heel to toe definitely accommodates my neutral running stride. This is definitely a shoe I enjoy because it is springy enough to pick up the pace during a 5k, and comfortable enough to pound the pavement for a half marathon.
customer_reviews.author: Brent A. VanSteenkiste

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: As the useful life of my Brooks Pure Flow 6 was coming to an end, I decided to try other brands. Tried Merrell, Saucony and Adidas, and they all went back for a variety of reasons (uncomfortable, strange fit, too high an arch, etc). So back to Brooks it was. The Launch 6 is great value. Very comfortable fit, better cushioning than my old Pure Flow 6 and the blue sole looks very cool. I'm sticking with Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Abhijeet Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Fits better than the 5
customer_reviews.text: Editions 1-4 fit my feet pretty much perfectly, but the 5 felt loose in the forefoot. The 6 is back to what I remember and liked: Light, springy, good roll off and supportive fit without being loose. These also seem to breathe better so looking forward to the warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You get Brooks and you know what to expect. Great shoes, great comfort, great run. Took them out for 3-4 miles right out of the box; felt like old trusted runions, not brand new unboxed shoes. Love me some Brooks!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, except metal sticking out...
customer_reviews.text: They looked like great shoes. I love Brooks. Sadly after a short time of running in them the metal on the heal started sticking out and hurting my sons foot. He has only used these for about a month before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Wildgirl26

customer_reviews.title: Great model from Brooks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Launch line. I've run in pretty much every brand out there and for the past several years always come back to the Brooks Launch. I also have their Glycerin model and can't stand it.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort/Support
customer_reviews.text: These are my fourth or fifth pair of Brooks Launch shoes. I am a walker.......not a runner. The fit, support, and comfort keeps this 84 year young man out walking every other day!! Love em!!
customer_reviews.author: Walt Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I use there predominantly for my every day walking around shoes. I work in healthcare and am on my feet constantly. These shoes are very comfortable and I feel very secure in them. These shoes can also transition to running/workout shoes seemlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt MWF

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: Finally found these Launch line of Brooks, easily the most comfortable shoes I’ve found. I’m 6’3” and 245lbs, and I’ve found shoes make a big difference. These are so great, I bought a couple pair.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the money. Lasted about 2.5 months. I walk and run about 30 miles a week. I put about 280 miles on them before the tread was smooth. Still worth it for the price. I can buy two pair of these for the price one pair of the high end with twice the wear .
customer_reviews.author: richard g

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for standing all day or running/walking
customer_reviews.text: My feet hurt from more expensive shoes. I am on my feet all day as I work at a hospital and these are perfect. I also ordered 2 more pair for walking/running. I am still wearing my first pair from 2.5 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Launch
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as previous versions of the same line. One would expect a new version of the same model would meet similar needs but this is not the case. Heel support is nowhere as complete. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pokorney

customer_reviews.title: Top is too tight ... Shoe is light ... But thick
customer_reviews.text: I got injured after 10 days of using this shoe! And I am not sure I can return them. Naturally not happy. They are wide alright, but they are not high enough and were always either too tight on top or too loose regardless of how I tightened the laces. They are also light, but too thick ... The sole is to thick for what I wanted. Floor like the description was misleading a bit ...
customer_reviews.author: Kipchirchir Bitok

customer_reviews.title: Don't look like the real estate thing
customer_reviews.text: I was happy the way they looked when I got them they just didn't have that Brooks feel to them. When I first saw them My thought was they look like knock off. I have own several pairs of brooks and they just don't like like they are brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for someone starting to work out a whole lot more and who badly needed new shoes. I have a similar women's pair I absolutely love. I haven't seen him in other shoes since!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lacking Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent shoe. Not enough arch support for consistent use. However, it is very light and fits well. I do feel lighter when I run, just have experienced arch pain after my runs as opposed to other running shoes I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: First time using the shoe and i beat my personal record by 2 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have a route that I go that's about 5.2 miles at about 37:30, after putting these on I ran 35:34! before I was using nike Pegasus 35 which those were my favorite shoes before but these definitely felt better. it has very nice support too.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Feet light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes- they are light weight and make my feet feel secure - I am on my feet all day and these have been a godsend
customer_reviews.author: A. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but other reviewers are right - it's more on the harder cushion side of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Upper is great, heel is great, the cushioning as others have stated is a bit "hard", or harder than the ghost, and not to my personal liking. If you want a less-cushy shoe, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: W. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lost some cushion
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but lacking in some cushion. I'm 160 at 5'11 and I can feel the road more in these guys than earlier Brooks shoes of the same make and model.
customer_reviews.author: Corb

customer_reviews.title: Maybe defective
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe hurts my heel every time I wear it, and can hardly even wear for casual wear. I think a mfg defect and should have returned, but my bad
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: My son is in the army and is an avid runner who participates marathons etc. He loves these shoes this is his 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Brooks
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Brooks !! Needed a lighter color, but not white. These fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart J. Mccall

customer_reviews.title: Run run run and keep running
customer_reviews.text: Love these and great fit, just wish the prices for this brand weren’t so high. That’s the only downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Suzears

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, very comfortable and so far I have had a few people give nice compliments on my shoes. This is my 4th pair of Brooks running shoes in 4 years. I still have 2 of other sets that still fit and feel nice, I just like a change every year. My Wife calls me high maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: M Shannon Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Best running shoes I've owned this far - Brooks for this price really can't be beaten!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lang

customer_reviews.title: They are an Outstanding Shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are everything they claim to be! Purchase a pair and you will see.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Sumbry

customer_reviews.title: Former Nike fan.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing only Nike for decades, this is the second pair of Brooks I've bought this month.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Neutral Balanced, Great Responsiveness
customer_reviews.text: Typically I wear a 10.5 but I’ve owned this shoe before and knew I needed a size up. These looked great and are very functional overall. I am definitely happy with the quality on these and would recommend to anyone needing an energetic neutral balanced shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he says they are VERY comfortable and true to size! He wears an 11 in other sneakers so that’s what size I bought and he says they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: most wonderful sneaker
customer_reviews.text: most comfortable sneaker i had on my foot in years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son and he loves them. He is a cross country and track runner and runs everyday, He finds these very comfortable and stable on both track and off road for his daily runs.
customer_reviews.author: sea1sst

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fan of Brooks. I was an avid ASICS supporter but have been using Brooks for last 3 years and the support these show provides to a runner are the best. Very light, durable and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sheetal Deshmukh

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes the energy return is top notch I also really like how light they are I’ve been running with brooks adrenaline 19 those are a bit heavy so this shoe is a nice change.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 5th or 6th pair of Brooks. Best shoes made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Krickbaum

customer_reviews.title: Quality Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have become a big fan of the Launch 6. I love the spring or response feeling of the Launch. These colors are one of my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with staining
customer_reviews.text: I have used Brooks launch for several years in different versions. This particular color was very disappointing in getting mud stains out. I had only had them maybe a week when I took them on a run in forest and got a little bit muddy. I actually threw them in the washer and now the shoes still have brown stains almost like rust and I can’t get them out
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hi the ground running
customer_reviews.text: I had to jump into these shoes cold turkey with a 6 mile, hilly street run. The shoes seem to be true to size. My transition to these shoes was seamless. I had no blisters or discomfort. They are lightweight. I have 55 mile on them so far with minimal wear (as a toe runner). I am buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great road running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Has just the right amount of cushion for 1/2 marathon runs without being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: WhoDid

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the ghost. Pay more and get a better Brooks shoe
customer_reviews.author: sean edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and supportive. I use them for playing pickleball.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny SanDiego

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Brooks running shoes you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tragically A Hipster

customer_reviews.title: Brah get you some Brooks!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always heard brooks are great running shoes but these are amazingly comfortable for just everyday needs.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Wow, totally revitalized my runs!
customer_reviews.text: I had been running with old shoes for too long. the past three runs have shaved 30 seconds off my mile pace. My pace has improved and the feel of these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marello

customer_reviews.title: Another great shoe from Brooks.
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing Brooks shoes about 12 years ago when I was running a lot of half marathons and participating in triathlons and I have never looked back. Always a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good for long runs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always ran with Nike pegasus, which are also great and decided to try something new. The first couple miles I ran with these, it felt weird, but I assumed they just needed to be broken in. To my surprise, they felt great after about 30 miles of jogging. I think this is a great shoe for running with an injury. They feel a lot sturdier than Pegasus too, but I wish it was more responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Choi

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits good and has good cushion. Good quality shoe for the price. The first time I purchased Brooks shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Flow
customer_reviews.text: Feet never hurt, always cool and comfortable all day long
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: great shoes.  Excellent supination support
customer_reviews.text: With a bit of break in they are great shoes. Great for supination support.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Blisters galore
customer_reviews.text: These gave me blisters on both feet! I've tried blister tape, duct tape, and gel cushions, nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are one of my favorites, my boys are hard on shoes, forget to untie them, and this brand always holds up to the rough and tough day to day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jenne Voelker

customer_reviews.title: Different than previous models
customer_reviews.text: I've been a launch fan and had 2 previous models. These feel different than the previous ones unfortunately. Looks like I have to find a new running shoe for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son - his favorite running shoe! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Ben P

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my new shoes. Went on my first run with these new shoes and when I got gome after an hour of running the left Brooks logo was missing. I'm totally bummed and feel like I shouldn't wear them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light. And feel great in your feet. Brooks knows how to make a great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: lagoog

customer_reviews.title: Cute look, stiffer heel.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I get compliments every time I wear them. Heel is a little stiffer than I prefer, but will buy the other ones because I love colors/style.
customer_reviews.author: Nick nesmith

customer_reviews.title: Thank you ! Brooks are the best sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers were a gift for my son. So far he loves them. They are nice , fit well and offer good support. They arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Great Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the Brooks launch lineup. Launch 2’s were the best. 3s were terrible. These are so much better in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Poole Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, my son says they’re comfortable and they seem to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only run in them a few times, but they are great running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Robison

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with the materials
customer_reviews.text: The front runner piece is coming apart from the show already, it's only been 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. Always been a huge fan of the Launch series. Launch 6 are the best they have ever made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Goss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received a few days ran 4 miles last night, the Brooks Launch 6 felt good no problems with the fit. I haven't ran in Brooks for a while I have 3 different running shoes and switch from run to run. The new Brooks felt as good as my broken in others.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great when I purchased
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were great when I bought them, but the tread wore down very quickly 2 months of walking in these and they are ready for the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Great runners!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be sad when they stop making these, and they always stop making the best ones. Am I right people? Huh? Huh? Am I right?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cournoyer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! He stands all day at work and he said his feet actually don’t hurt at the end of the day. He says they where a little snug at first but by the end of the day they where perfect. He has wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Demine

customer_reviews.title: Brooks is the Best Running Shoe - Period
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, comfortable from the first moment. Very light, but great support.
customer_reviews.author: JediTexan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they're truly amazing both in looks and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Se estan despegando en la punta (They are taking off at the toe of the left shoe)
customer_reviews.text: Good morning, as the Guarantee applies to these shoes since they are taking off on their own and I have not used them once to run, I have only used them a few times to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Neldin

customer_reviews.title: Love my Brooks Launch
customer_reviews.text: It's a comfortable and well made shoe. Will probably be using brooks for running now.
customer_reviews.author: josh j

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and they are stiff enough for the trail and soft enough for the road. From a 3 mile trail run or a 13 mile road run, Brooks has made a very versatile shoe for the runner.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best sneakers on the market with people with foot pain.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this before at another store and the minute i had put them on it was like walking on air. Good fit and one of the most comfortable sneakers i have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Heath jr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great value, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend for Christmas. He has loved every pair of Brooks that I for him. No complaints from us.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Brooks. There is no substitute.
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Brooks and can not say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not as much cushion as Hola. Ok for short run less than 13.1 miles
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dude

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: We purchase Brooks all of the time for our High Schooler Cross Country runner. This particular pair runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Half a size bigger than Launch 5
customer_reviews.text: They are half a size bigger than the launch 5
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Cordovez Diaz

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are light and comfortable and are contoured to a foot shape the way all shoes should be.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light and comfortable and are contoured to a foot shape the way all shoes should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was not new
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were meant to be new but show obvious signs of wear; dirt and rocks on the sole, scuffs around the edges and a black stain on the upper.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and feels good on the road
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that feels light and responsive on the road.
customer_reviews.author: AustraliatoVT

customer_reviews.title: Received correct box but shoes were not correct style and color
customer_reviews.text: Box was correct Color AND style was not correct Am returning and repurchasing correct color and style
customer_reviews.author: Krc0916

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of Kicks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight good for work when you are in your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mason De Vries

customer_reviews.title: best brand
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: America is beautifully comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the elegance of the shoes! Also the fit and comfortable of these brooks walking shoes were wonderful .
customer_reviews.author: EBU

customer_reviews.title: Price and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Have only ran in them once, so far, so good. Comfortable, light, and stylish. Looking forward to getting in some miles this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this comfy! I don’t feel pain in my heels after playing like before. This pair is real game changer for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ruhul Islam

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase, would highly recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Erwin

customer_reviews.title: The consistency and durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve run in Brooks launch since they first came out and they’re consistently the same fit every time. And the durability is always good 400+ miles per pair.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lague

customer_reviews.title: Still the ones!
customer_reviews.text: Have been running in light weight Brooks for years and all generations of the Launch. The most recent ones work fine. Don't screw it up, Brooks!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy D.

customer_reviews.title: Like them Brooks
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe, fit perfect, second pair I have. Awesome price for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Luis Zetina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the Launch model. Very comfortable and styles and colors have improved over the years
customer_reviews.author: Adele Webb

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Launch 6 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Elastic and fast, with zero distractions. The cushioning of the BioMoGo midsole and the rebounding rubber create a feeling of elasticity to the sole of the foot. The Midfoot Transition Zone is contoured for a quick transition from heel to toe. The monoblock mesh upper and the inner ankle boot are so light and fresh from the outside hear them.
feature_bullets: THIS SHOE IS FOR: This is a great option for neutral, efficient runners who don’t like a super soft shoe. It has just-right spring and is light enough to be a race shoe for longer distances like the marathon.
ENERGIZED FEEL: Delivers a responsive and springy ride to add extra lift to your stride without compromising support or speed.
SPRINGY CUSHIONING: BioMoGo DNA midsole cushioning and rebounding rubber create a springy feel underfoot.
LIGHTWEIGHT FIT: The one-piece mesh upper and internal bootie are so light and breezy, they feel like they’re not even there.
